description: Kubernetes Object encompasses various K8 specifc logs fields. is a (Kubernetes is a unique type of container orchestration).
caption: kubernetes
name: kubernetes

container_orchestration_runtime.description: The Kubernetes Resources object details resources that were operated on in the request

http_request.description: The HTTP Request Object details a request made to a web server

http_response.description: The HTTP Response Object details a response from a web server to a requester

level.description: AuditLevel at which event was generated

operation.description: Kubernetes verb/operation associated with the request

request.description: Embedded Kubernetes API JSON dict from the request

response.description: Embedded Kubernetes API JSON dict from the response

stage.description: Stage of the request handling when this event instance was generated.

stage_timestamp.description: Time the request reached current audit stage

pod_name.description: The name of the pod inside the Kubernetes cluster

pod_uid.description: The ID of the pod inside the Kubernetes cluster

pod_ip.description: The IP of the pod inside the Kubernetes cluster

pod_namespace.description: The Namespace where the pod is located inside the Kubernetes cluster

container.description: The Container object inside the pod in a Kubernetes cluster

cluster_uid.description: The ID of the Kubernetes cluster

cluster_name.description: The Name of the Kubernetes cluster

node_name.description: The Name of the Node inside the Kubernetes cluster

node_ip.description: The IP of the Node inside the Kubernetes cluster
